content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 461.15 - Allocation of costs between steam plant and operating expenses to be made currently

State Regulations

Each utility shall determine currently the costs which
are applicable to the steam plant accounts and in the case of costs involving
allocations, the amount which is applicable to other accounts, such as
operating expenses, taxes, retirement work in progress, other balance sheet
accounts, and income or surplus accounts; the intent of this provision being
that such costs shall be allocated to the accounts to which they are applicable
when they are incurred. Notes
